thread.section_title: Everyone Loves Buttons Inc.® Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Everyone Loves Buttons Inc.® | custombuttons.com
thread.title: Becky Neely
thread.title_full: Everyone Loves Buttons Inc.® reviewed by Becky Neely

author: Becky Neely
title: Becky Neely
text: Our new vocal chorus group is trying to recruit enough members to form a new charter within Sweet Adelines. Having a button "Ask Me Where I Sing" was perfect for starting a conversation with strangers. We just talk about the group and hand them a business card. Perfect. I love buttons!
